text: Thin Lips are an American indie rock band from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. ==History== Thin Lips released their debut full-length album in 2016 titled Riff Hard on Lame-O Records. In 2017, Thin Lips released a split EP with Modern Baseball and The Superweaks. In 2018, Thin Lips released their second full-length album titled Chosen Family. ==References== Category:Musical groups from Philadelphia
title: Thin Lips
